deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Proxmox VE using YAML is being removed but there was a error importing your YAML configuration.

Ensure connection to Proxmox VE works and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Proxmox VE YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to set up the integration manually.
deprecated_yaml.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration is being removed
